item.title: Black people
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“WhiteShadow, post:48, topic:134629”]Black people, are the same as any race, yes.

Unfortunately most blacks don’t know what to do with their lives. They’re a drainage upon society. These blacks created this feeling of anger towards their race. So let us be kind toward the (very little) remaining population of blacks that have become stereotyped and marked as (nigger) through their “G G G” people.

I hate rap. I hate “diamonds on my damn chain” styles. I hate fatass carpenter jeans, and the “yo dawg, whichgang be u? I get my moonay from drugs. wahoo. You know when I wz in hi sckools i took algbra 6 times” hood. I hate the “let’s get some pipes and rape the cars”. Of course everyone jokes and does these things once in a while, and that’s k. If you like rap, that’s fine, music is very opinionated. But if this has just summed up your life, then noo.

I hate these kind of people. Go die, please, better yet, go get suppressed by the “real” people who contribute to mankind.[/quote]

^ ^ what he said ^ ^

item.title: Black people
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

I love the people that try to say that black people do crime because they’re poor. That’s the scapegoat for all the crime they do? Let’s look at the rich black people. The sports players e.g. Michael Vick. They act the exact same way as the ones that live in the projects. I try not to be racist but it’s hard when the asians and blacks move into my neighborhood and the crime rate skyrockets and house values go down. Also, let’s look at the world geography. Which place is the most fucked up and poor? Africa. I’m not saying I’m racist actually I’m far from it but I can’t entirely rule out that black people might be a little more inclined to crime and that they aren’t too good at controlling themselves.

Read full topic

Look up government-sponsored housing in your area and take a trip there, see how much of a shithole your average council estate (to use a british term) is - the majority of people that live there are white.

Anyhow I’m against slavery and all but when they act “ghetto” and are constantly sitting on there ass or committing crimes it makes me wonder, couldn’t we utilize them better…(waits for the racist flames to begin).

Oh and by the way I’m not racist I believe there is a huge difference between a nigger and a black person, it all has to do with the attitude, you wana act gangsta then you my friend are a nigger, you want to contribute to the good of mankind, then you, as I see it, are just as good as anyone else.[/quote]

item.title: Black people
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I just hate how some people (of African descent) try to use ‘being black’ to solve all of their problems and use it as excuse to everything they suck at. My dad, the most equal person I know (even went to an all black high school for 2 years) had to fire this HUGE black woman, who quite frankly sucked at her job. She was always late, not doing anything, eating all the time, and when my dad fired her, she sued us because my dad ‘was racist’.
My dad ended up pwning her in the face in court, but still. That stuff pisses me off.


Video to prove how dumb some African-Americans really can be.
Wants to “Exterminate the entire White race”, brought up at a Katrina Issues meeting. Owner of ‘Blacknificant Books’ Rofl.
